Posts.Content: MyMomHasBRCA wrote: My mom, age 52, was Dx 5 months ago with Stage 1 invasive ductal Ca which is HER 2 negative...She had a lumpectomy with centinal node bx which was negative.(yeahhh)... Lump was very small, the size of an m&m..and margins were clean after lumpectomy.. She was to have 6 chemo Tx of TC..but only received 5..she became really ill after 4 and 5 and the dr felt that because of her response to the Tx...that 5 was enough and did not want her to have #6...Her post chemo physical exam and tests show no active cancer cells in her body..(again yeahhh)... She is being told that now she is to go on to 6 weeks of Radiation..5 days per week... We would like to know how many of you have not gone through with the Rads.. We are considering not doing it and would like to hear from others that we in this situation... Thank you in advance... Dx 6/19/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/1 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation or no radiation, that is our question!! MyMomHasBRCA MyMomHasBRCA
